name: VoBadge
description: Adds a VO (Version Originale) badge to series posters when the content is only available in the original language without the preferred language audio track.
overview: Visual Indicator for Original Language Content

versions.changelog: Fixed: Use BadgeService instead of IDynamicImageProvider for reliable badge application. IDynamicImageProvider is for generating new images, not modifying existing ones.
Initial release with VO badge support for TV series
Initial release with VO badge support for TV series
